name: Color Tap Plus
description:
Color Tap is a fast-paced game against time and color.

Within 60 seconds tap the correct color to climb the leaderboard, but tap the wrong color and you’ll lose points.

Hitting a color streak will provide bonus points. If you can continue the streak the bonus points will increase.

Can you get a flawless victory?

Please submit any feedback to support@irvinmedia.com

You can always say hi to me on Twitter - @thelukeirvin


Thanks for playing!
